Movie about two Australian girls--Debbie (Nell Schofield) and Sue (Sue Knight)--and what happens when they become girlfriends of two surly bikers--Casey (Ladd Beharrie) and Gary Glazier (Glenn Barnes). It's a classic "re-education" story and many people were the better for it as they watched Debbie, an atheist, become surprised by the power of love bestowed upon her by hateful Gary.<|end_of_text|>

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople form an angry mob to destroy the beast that is terrorizing their lives.
Based on the famous true story, this one and only hit should not have been made. A second print was slashed with scissors at some cinemas but a sequel was never thought of by director Karel Reisz who had previously directed
